SYS-0001.title: User not authenticated
SYS-0001.message: User authentication is not done. You need to log in again.

SYS-0002.title: System error
SYS-0002.message: One or more field input values are invalid. Please check again.

SYS-0003.title: System error
SYS-0003.message: An internal server error occurred. Please contact us if the problem is not solved.

SYS-0004.title: Is someone using a token that has been revoked?
SYS-0004.message: Someone is trying to sign in to your account. Please check and log in again to continue using.

SYS-0005.title: User authentication expired
SYS-0005.message: The expiration date of user authentication has expired. Please start over again from the beginning.

AUTH-0001.title: Missing value
AUTH-0001.message: You have entered incomplete information. Please provide all the necessary details to proceed.

AUTH-0002.title: Unauthorized
AUTH-0002.message: Your email or password is incorrect, please re-enter.

AUTH-0003.title: Invalid email
AUTH-0003.message: You have entered invalid email. Please provide a valid email to continue.

AUTH-0004.title: Weak password
AUTH-0004.message: You have entered a weak password, please re-enter the stronger password.

AUTH-0005.title: Existed email
AUTH-0005.message: You have entered exist email. Please use another email to proceed.

AUTH-0006.title: Invalid gender
AUTH-0006.message: You have choose invalid gender, please choose only Male, Female and None

AUTH-0009.title: Invalid token
AUTH-0009.message: There is an error when verify your email, please try again.

FILE-0001.title: File doesn't exist
FILE-0001.message: File doesn't exist, please re-send with new file and submit again

BAD-0001.title: Incorrect data type
BAD-0001.message: {field} has an incorrect data type. Please re-enter.
